TextView.android:text: Rules and Regulations: -The user should have to provide his/her Aadhar number and Mobile number. -The user have to enter the OTP that is sent to his aadhar registered mobile number. -A Complaint without any proof can be accepted if majority people registered that complaint -The Complaint with a valid video/audio/images can be taken into consideration at the time of proof submission. -If the complaint is true then corresponding action will be taken on the officials. Caution: -If the Complaints are found to be Fake then the user will be penalised and sometimes can be imprisioned based on the act.
